title: Much higher ms for +3months, same internet connection speed anywhere else
body:
Hello and thank you for reading this.

As the title says i´ve been having more than doble ms (from 60ms to 130ms) over the past 3 months. The ms im having in every other server (EU and LAN are the ones i´ve been trying) are still the same, so the problem is only with my connection to the NA servers. 
Any suggestions are highly appreciated,

 Thank you.

Edit: Forgot to say im originally from Spain so I´m sry for any errors you may find here ^^

replies.body:
Drastic changes in your latency (ping) to a server are generally caused by ISP routing changes. Since you've tried the connection guide and seen no change in your connection, we'll need to investigate into your pathing to the server. To assist us in checking out your route, run a set of traceroutes using [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/) for 5 minutes with the IP address 192.64.170.1, then export the results to a Text. 

Attach the log with your [ticket submission](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and one of our tech specialists will reach out to you. Let me know if you have any questions.

Thank you for the help, i will do that.

Edit: I tried it but i cant reach that IP address, should i post it anyway?
 This is the IP i´ve been trying to reach before the one you told me: 104.160.131.3

Definitely, attach whatever results you have of your traceroute with your ticket so one of our tech specialists can get back to you. It would also help to attach a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), so they know what exact network configuration you're running and where problems may be.

I've been battling this for over 3 months too. Im so fed up with riot blaming my "unstable connection" im about to quit. Can't rank due to crazy inconsistent pings. heres my video from tonight. Check the delay in my commands.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QHgMiIYZ-nk

Yeah man i feel you, it seems to only be a problem with riot servers. Although my ping is just consistently high instead of high peaks like yours. Hope we can fix this soon, I would also like to play rankeds again.

Well this is a POSSIBLE cause, riot moved there servers to Chicago which created overall lower pings for people, but some players on the east coast experience higher Ping. 

You can also try using this [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your connection is set up properly.

Thanks for the answer, I thought they moved the servers last year so i thought the ping would have been worse as soon as they did it and not only for the past 3 months. I already read and followed the connection troubleshooting guide but it didnt help.
